agents.name: research-agent
agents.description: Systematic web research specialist for gathering and organizing documentation, technical specifications, and reference materials
agents.use_case: Fetch documentation, research topics, build knowledge bases

agents.name: research-docs-fetcher
agents.description: Specialized agent for fetching and organizing research documentation from multiple sources
agents.use_case: Fetch and organize documentation from URLs or search results

agents.name: quality-control-enforcer
agents.description: Ensures quality standards and consistency across projects and documentation
agents.use_case: Verify quality standards, run validations, generate quality reports

agents.name: work-completion-summarizer
agents.description: Summarizes completed work and generates comprehensive work summaries
agents.use_case: Generate summaries of completed work, create status reports
